channel.title: Clothing on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in Clothing on madewhere

item.title: Dehen 1920
item.description: Dehen 1920 is a clothing manufacturer based in Portland, Oregon.

item.title: Stanfield's
item.description: Stanfield’s is a Canadian clothing manufacturer. They produce a wide range of clothing from underwear to outerwear, as well as a line of wool clothing, from their Nova Scotia factories.

item.title: Nab Leather Co
item.description: Nab Leather Co is a leather goods manufacturer in Ontario, Canada. They produce belts, wallets, and other accessories.

item.title: Tanner Goods
item.description: Tanner Goods is a leather goods manufacturer based in Portland, OR. They produce a range of belts, wallets, bags, and other accessories. While Tanner’s core products are produced in the USA, they do not exclusively carry US-made products.

item.title: Reigning Champ
item.description: Reigning Champ is an athletic wear designer and manufacturer, based in Vancouver, BC. All of their products are made in Canada.

item.title: Rogue Territory
item.description: Rogue Territory is a clothing brand, manufactured primarily in California; they make denim jeans, jackets, shirts, and accessories.

item.title: Mission Workshop
item.description: Mission Workshop is a San Francisco-based maker of bags and technical clothing; they focused mostly on bike gear, but have since diversified into more technical wear.

item.title: Graf Lantz
item.description: Graf Lantz is a Los Angeles manufacturer. They make a large number of items for the home and office, as well as bags and other accessories; it spans items like desk mats, sunglass cases, tote bags, face masks, etc.

item.title: Redwood Classics
item.description: Casual wear manufacturer based in Canada.

item.title: Darn Tough
item.description: Darn Tough offers merino wool socks for a range of purposes; they are probably best known for their hiking sock, but offer more casual options as well. They are made in Vermont, and guaranteed for life .

item.title: Birkenstock
item.description: Birkenstock’s well-known cork sole sandals—as well as many of their other shoes—are made in Germany. Other products have varying origins.

item.title: Red Wing
item.description: Red Wing is a shoe manufacturer based in Minnesota. They offer a “heritage” line of shoes which are fully made in the USA. They also offer a “work” line of shoes and boots which are of varying origins.

item.title: MoonStar
item.description: MoonStar offers a wide variety of shoes, which are made in Japan.

item.title: Shoes Like Pottery
item.description: Shoes Like Pottery makes casual low and high top sneakers. As with all MoonStar sneakers, they are made in Japan.

item.title: Blue Owl
item.description: Blue Owl is a retailer which specializes in workwear, carrying a number of well made brands including a large number Japanese brands. Unfortunately not all of the brands they carry are responsibly made, so research each before buying. They also have a physical store in Seattle, WA.
